name: Flapster
description:
Use your left mouse click or space bar to fly

Touch works for phones but it seems to be a little sensitive  

I do know on mobile when you click choose bird it goes to settings and I plan on resolving this soon .  Keep an eye out for the update.

Flapster is a flappy bird endless runner game.  Right now it is in development and you can only choose two birds.  I plan on making more, just wanted to get the game out there and have some flappy bird experts test it out.
